title: Whiskey Quickie: Peg Leg Porker Bourbon Review
description:
On this Whiskey Quickie by Bourbon Pursuit, we review Peg Leg Porker Bourbon. This non-age stated bourbon is 90 proof and $40 MSRP. Let us know what you think. Cheers!

Whiskey Quickie is brought to you by Barrell Bourbon. Learn more at BarrellBourbon.com.

DISCLAIMER: The whiskey in this review was provided to us at no cost courtesy of the spirit producer. We were not compensated by the spirit producer for this review. This is our honest opinion based on what we tasted. Please drink responsibly.
